pages.text: While brass is an extremely versatile material, some applications require more strength. Constructing a machine from heat-resistant materials found in the Nether allows you to safely attain the high temperatures required for the production of steel. Given a working pool of molten iron equivalent to nine blocks $(thing)(11664mB)$() and provided with carbon and injected steam,
molten steel will be output at a rate of one nugget per operation.
